data.description: Class to search e-Bay world-wide sites
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The EbayUK.pm module has now been improved to allow searching
    across ebay websites in multiple countries.

    It makes sense to give this class a name which reflects its
    function. The EbayUK.pm and EBayGlobal.pm modules will be put in the
    same bundle.
